What incoming forces?

::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus detects the bots flying in, and is ready for an attack by the
time the missiles are fired. The computer-aimed weapon on his right
arm quickly locks onto the two missiles, destroying them both. His
wrist missile launcher gets a lock on Unitron, firing two signature
seeking missiles. The missiles reflected the light off of their
fronts, just as they would reflect most laser blasts.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl spins, slamming the missiles with his large talons as they
approach, making them explode and char his armor severely. He roars,
seeing Divebomb diving.

Tucking his wings in, Prowl dives as well, gaining on Divebomb thanks
to his weight, and lashing out with his talons.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Double
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun 
> Crusher/Reflector:
> 
> 
> 
> Shockwave armed his missile launchers getting a target lock.  "ALL
HAIL THE 
> NEO DECEPTICON EMPIRE AND PREPARE TO FEEL THE WRATH OF THE EMPEROR! 
EMPEROR 
> SHOCKWAVE!" he intoned loudly enough for many on the battle to hear.
> 
> The NDE Emperor launched two energy-signature seeking missiles at
Scavenger
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron hovered momentarily in his space fighter mode, knowing
exactly who 
> would die.  Getting a lock, he launched off two energy-signature
seeking 
> missiles at Zardus.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter flew low in a strafing run, twenty rapid laser blasts
lancing out 
> at the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch approached the base in his stealth mode, cloaked from
sensors 
> and view.  He raised his left pincher, firing off two
energy-signature 
> seeking missiles at Prowl, the right pincher raising to launch two
missiles 
> at the Cybertronian Fire.  While doing this, he launched his
cyber-bee, 
> Beeline, and ran hard left so he wasn't in the same place.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror took flight, gaining altitude rapidly.  "It's payback,
traitors!" 
> he screamed, firing down four ion disks (two from each arm).  Two at
Dark 
> One, the two others at the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector raised gradually into the air, raising both stinger missile 
> launchers.  From the left one he fired two missiles at Blades, and
from the 
> right one he fired two missiles at Breakdown's back.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement hovered, looking at the battle.  "Brotherhood, I detect
incoming 
> forces.  Arm your weapons, and until these new enemies arrive, lay
waste to 
> the bases in the name of Unicron!" he yelled, raising his right fist
which 
> transformed into the shape of a cannon, firing two missiles off at
the 
> Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher's right wrist raised, a cannon attached to it pointed at
the CF.  
> Two fusion blasts erupted from the depths of the weapon heading for
the enemy 
> base.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector raised his left wrist, the twin-mounted barrel on it
launching off 
> four missiles (two from each barrel) at the Cybertronian Fire. 
"Prepare for 
> death, heathens."
